Military_Academy.description: Training students for tactical leadership and operational roles in starship or ground combat environments.

Tactical_Systems_Training.description: Training in the use of tactical systems and operations, including ship-based combat tactics and leadership skills.
Tactical_Systems_Training.title: Tactical Officer

Logistics_and_Supply_Management.description: Focuses on logistics and supply chain management, essential for sustaining long-term military or corporate operations.
Logistics_and_Supply_Management.title: Supply Officer

Special_Operations_Training.description: Special forces training, emphasizing stealth, close combat, and high-risk missions behind enemy lines.
Special_Operations_Training.title: Special Ops Trainee

Covert_Operations_Training.description: Training focused on secret intelligence gathering, sabotage, and stealth missions in hostile environments.
Covert_Operations_Training.title: Covert Operations Trainee

Corporate_Training.description: Training for leadership, security, and intelligence roles within corporate-controlled environments.

Corporate_Resource_Management.description: Focuses on managing corporate assets, leadership, and ensuring profitability and resource optimization.
Corporate_Resource_Management.title: Junior Analyst

Security_Systems_Training.description: Trains corporate security officers to protect assets and prevent sabotage, theft, or corporate espionage.
Security_Systems_Training.title: Security Officer

Corporate_Espionage_and_Intelligence.description: Trains corporate agents in intelligence gathering, sabotage, and covert operations against rival corporations.
Corporate_Espionage_and_Intelligence.title: Junior Intelligence Officer

Market_Strategist_Training.description: Focused on corporate market manipulation, financial strategy, and competitive advantage.
Market_Strategist_Training.title: Market Analyst

Technical_Institute.description: Training engineers and specialists in ship maintenance, AI systems, and robotics.

Starship_Systems_Engineering.description: Trains engineers to maintain starship systems, including power, propulsion, and life support.
Starship_Systems_Engineering.title: Starship Technician

Robotics_Engineering.description: Focuses on the design, repair, and optimization of robotic systems for space and planetary operations.
Robotics_Engineering.title: Robotics Technician

AI_Systems_Programming.description: Specializes in the programming and maintenance of advanced AI systems for ship control and automation.
AI_Systems_Programming.title: AI Programmer

Weapon_Systems_Engineering.description: Specializes in building, maintaining, and enhancing advanced weaponry and defense systems.
Weapon_Systems_Engineering.title: Weapons Platforms Engineer

Space_Academy.description: Training for navigation, piloting, and long-term space exploration missions.

Astrogation_Training.description: Specializes in stellar navigation, course plotting, and navigating uncharted regions of space.
Astrogation_Training.title: Explorations Navigator

Flight_Cadet_Training.description: Training for piloting spacecraft, managing takeoffs, landings, and navigation through space.
Flight_Cadet_Training.title: Pilot

Space_Exploration_Training.description: Specializes in long-term space missions, including navigation, survival in space, and system maintenance.
Space_Exploration_Training.title: Exploration Operative

Combat_Pilot_Training.description: Specializes in space combat piloting, dogfighting, and handling spacecraft in combat situations.
Combat_Pilot_Training.title: Combat Pilot

University.description: Academic training focused on advanced research, medical, and scientific fields.

Medicaly_Training.description: Trains in emergency medical response, surgery, and life-saving interventions, especially in combat zones.
Medicaly_Training.title: Medical Cadet

Xeno-Biology_Training.description: Specializes in the study of alien species, their biology, and how to exploit or protect against them.
Xeno-Biology_Training.title: Xeno-Biologist

Stasis_Technology_Training.description: Specializes in stasis technology, including its medical uses and emergency repair of stasis systems.
Stasis_Technology_Training.title: Stasis Technician

Biotechnology_Training.description: Focuses on bio-engineering, enhancing human capabilities through biological modifications.
Biotechnology_Training.title: Biotech Specialist
